definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: Daye city or village women's federation of women's demonstration focused on building the village.
sentences.chinese: 该村还是大冶市妇联重点建设的巾帼示范村。

sentences.english: In contemporary, the national voice and the voices of women's federation hanged together.
sentences.chinese: 在当代，国家的声音则与妇联结合在一起。

sentences.english: It is the first delegation of the ACWF-president level that has been to the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 这是全国妇联主席首次率团出访这两个国家。

sentences.english: However, the All-China Women's Federation appears unimpressed.
sentences.chinese: 但是，中国妇联对此并不满意。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is a great importance to study and investigate the variation tendency of Women's Federation organization.
sentences.chinese: 所以，研究妇联组织的变化趋势，就显得犹为重要。

sentences.english: Soon a women's association was formed in our village.
sentences.chinese: 不久我们村成立了妇联。

definition: the Communist Youth League, abbr. for 共產主義青年團|共产主义青年团[Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2]
planned childbirth/birth control/family planning/abbr. for 計劃生育|计划生育
abbr. for 中國文學藝術界聯合會|中国文学艺术界联合会, China Federation of Literary and Art Circles (CFLAC)
United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)/abbr. for 統一戰線工作部|统一战线工作部[Tong3 yi1 Zhan4 xian4 Gong1 zuo4 bu4]
director of the local committee of the Women's Federation
